title: Huge packet loss
body:
I am having huge packet loss. play several games where packet loss total for a game was 11 then consequent games the loss was 2300+.

no issues within other online games such as overwatch etc.

replies.body: Then why is lol the only game with this amount of packet loss, why isn't in more consistent, why does it only affect some and not others even when playing in the same house, and why does it not affect all of my accounts?

Typically packet loss is on the ISP side of things, so there may not be a lot we can do. If you're already sure that the main issue is packet loss, go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if we could adjust anything to give your network an easier time.
